headline.seo: Monkeys Fattened Up to Study Human Obesity
headline.print_headline: Today’s Lab Rats of Obesity: Furry, Fattened Couch Potatoes
headline.main: Today’s Lab Rats of Obesity: Furry Couch Potatoes

docs.lead_paragraph: Rhesus macaques in an Oregon research center are being turned into couch potatoes with weight problems for study.
docs.snippet: Rhesus macaques in an Oregon research center are being turned into couch potatoes with weight problems for study.

keywords.value: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals

headline.seo: Allergan’s Lap-Band Is Approved for Less Obese
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Band Device for Less Obese
headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Band Device for Less Obese

docs.lead_paragraph: The approval will make 26 million more Americans eligible for the procedure.
docs.snippet: The approval will make 26 million more Americans eligible for the procedure.

headline.main: After Menu Labels, Parents and Kids Order Same Foods

docs.abstract: Most parents and older children notice calorie counts posted in New York City restaurants, but the information doesn't stop them from ordering their favorite burgers and fries, new research shows.
docs.lead_paragraph: Most parents and older children notice calorie counts posted in New York City fast-food restaurants, but the information doesn't stop them from ordering their favorite burgers and fries, new research shows.
docs.snippet: Most parents and older children notice calorie counts posted in New York City restaurants, but the information doesn't stop them from ordering their favorite burgers and fries, new research shows.

headline.seo: Personal Health — New Dietary Guidelines for Americans
headline.print_headline: A Simple Map to the Land of Wholesome
headline.main: A Simple Map to the Land of Wholesome

docs.lead_paragraph: The government has offered new recommendations that clearly favor the health and well-being of consumers over hard-lobbying farm interests.
docs.snippet: The government has offered new recommendations that clearly favor the health and well-being of consumers over hard-lobbying farm interests.
